dcterms:creator: V. Mnih
N. Heess
A. Graves
dcterms:description: The MNIST Cluttered dataset contains 70,000 cluttered images of handwritten digits, where each image features randomly located digits surrounded by digit-like fragments.
dcterms:title: MNIST Cluttered

dcterms:creator: I. J. Goodfellow
Y. Bulatov
J. Ibarz
S. Arnoud
V. Shet
dcterms:description: The SVHN dataset consists of up to 250,000 real-world images of house numbers, containing between 1 and 5 digits in each image, with significant variability in scale and spatial arrangement.
dcterms:title: SVHN (Street View House Numbers)
